title: Cannot log in after password change
description: User is locked out of their account after successfully changing their password yesterday. Getting an 'invalid credentials' error.

title: Invoice #452 PDF corrupted
description: When trying to download the PDF for invoice 452, the file is corrupted and cannot be opened. Requires the invoice to be resent/regenerated.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode option
description: Requesting the addition of a dark mode theme for better visibility during late-night use.

title: Intermittent API endpoint 500 errors
description: The /data/v3 endpoint is returning 500 errors sporadically, impacting 1 out of 10 requests. This needs immediate investigation.

title: Incorrect tax calculation on recent purchase
description: The sales tax rate applied to my order #10123 seems incorrect based on my current location and local laws.

title: Typo on the 'Contact Us' page
description: There's a typo: 'receieve' instead of 'receive' in the contact form footer.

title: Database connection failing every night at 2 AM
description: Automated logs show a recurring database connection failure around 2:00 AM UTC. Needs monitoring and root cause analysis.

title: Missing order tracking link
description: Received shipping confirmation email for order #10125, but the tracking link is missing or broken.

title: Subscription cancellation not processed
description: I tried to cancel my subscription 3 days ago through the portal, but I received a charge notification today.

title: Request for documentation clarification on webhooks
description: The documentation for setting up webhooks lacks clear examples for payload validation.

title: UI elements overlapping on mobile screens
description: The navigation bar icons overlap the search bar when viewed on an iPhone SE.

title: Question about billing cycle adjustment
description: Can we change our billing cycle from monthly to quarterly? Need confirmation on the process and effect on current charges.
